_header: I believe on God in persons three
_description: The Creed — five stanzas rhyme royal

BodRawB408.First Lines:
I beleue on god in persones þreThe fader and sone and holi
                    gost…
BodRawB408.Last Lines:
…Helpyng oure lyfe her to amendeAnd graunt us þe life
                    þat neuer ende
BodRawB408.Attributed Title: CRedo in deum patrem et cetera (f. 4)
